## Load data

```{r}
data <- read_tsv("~/Projects/group_11_project/data/01_dat_load.tsv")
```

## Clean data

```{r}
data <- data |> 
  select(-...1) |> 
  filter(str_starts(ID_REF, "GSM")) |> 
  mutate(Gender = case_when(Gender == "Male" ~ 0,
                            Gender == "Female" ~ 1))
```

Cleaning collum names:

```{r}
data <- rename(data, age = `age (in years)`)
data <- rename(data, DFS = `DFS (in months)`)

```
